document_data.mainbody:
he Tavern Oer the Waters was a tavern in Loudwater in the Delimbiyr Vale in the midâ€“14 century DR.
Unusually, the tavern was built as a bridge over the Delimbiyr River itself, with entrances at each end. This made it a handy way of getting around. One end lay near The Woodlands Inn.
When the Zhentarim and Zhentilar commanded by Vaalgamon invaded the streets of Loudwater in the , the Heroes of Ascore were able to use The Tavern Oer the Waters to get around where theyd blocked the street for an ambush.
